recipes.title: Classic Southern Fried Chicken Wings
recipes.description: Crispy, golden-brown wings with a flavorful seasoning blend, served with truffle hot honey drizzle.

modifications.description: Use lard instead of vegetable oil for a traditional Southern flavor.
Add 1 tsp allspice and a pinch of Scotch bonnet chili powder to the seasoning blend.

recipes.inspiration: This dish brings the soulful traditions of the South to your kitchen, blending classic techniques with modern flavors.

ingredients.name: chicken wings
ingredients.notes: split into drumettes and flats for even cooking

ingredients.name: smoked paprika
ingredients.notes: adds smoky depth to the flavor

instructions.instruction: Marinate wings in buttermilk with paprika and cayenne for 4–6 hours. Cover and refrigerate.
instructions.tip: For a spicier kick, double the cayenne pepper.
instructions.troubleshooting: If wings are too soggy, pat dry before coating in flour.

instructions.instruction: Mix flour, salt, and spices in a large bowl to create the dry coating.
instructions.tip: Sift the flour to remove lumps for an even crust.

instructions.instruction: Remove wings from marinade, shaking off excess liquid, and coat thoroughly in the flour mixture. Let rest for 10 minutes.
instructions.tip: Letting the wings rest helps the coating adhere better during frying.

instructions.instruction: Heat vegetable oil in a deep fryer or large heavy pot to 350°F.
equipment_notes: Use a thermometer to maintain oil temperature.
A cast-iron Dutch oven works well for heat retention.

instructions.instruction: Fry wings in batches for 8–10 minutes, turning occasionally, until golden brown and crispy. Place on a wire rack to drain excess oil.
instructions.tip: Avoid overcrowding the fryer to maintain oil temperature.

instructions.instruction: Drizzle wings with truffle hot honey and garnish with fresh parsley before serving.
instructions.plating_instruction: Arrange wings in a cast-iron skillet or a rustic wooden board for presentation.

sides.title: Buttermilk Biscuits
sides.description: Flaky, buttery biscuits that complement the wings' crispiness.
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F.
Mix flour, baking powder, and salt in a bowl.
Cut in cold butter until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
Add buttermilk and mix until dough forms.
Roll out dough, cut into circles, and bake for 12–15 minutes.

variations.description: For cheesy biscuits, add 1/2 cup shredded cheddar.

drinks.title: Bourbon Honey Smash
drinks.description: A smoky-sweet cocktail that complements the honey drizzle.
instructions: Muddle mint with honey syrup and lemon juice.
Add bourbon and ice, then shake and strain.

compound_recipes.title: Southern Spice Blend
compound_recipes.description: A versatile seasoning mix for fried or grilled dishes.
instructions: Combine all ingredients and store in an airtight container.

recipes.title: Honey Garlic Grilled Wings
recipes.description: Juicy grilled wings glazed with a sweet and savory honey garlic sauce.

modifications.description: Replace olive oil with sesame oil and add 1 tbsp ginger paste to the marinade.
Add 1 tbsp lemon zest and replace soy sauce with balsamic vinegar for a tangy twist.

recipes.inspiration: Inspired by backyard summer BBQs, this recipe balances the sweetness of honey with the bold flavor of garlic.

ingredients.name: chicken wings
ingredients.notes: keep skin-on for better grilling results

ingredients.name: garlic cloves
ingredients.notes: fresh garlic preferred for robust flavor

instructions.instruction: Mix honey, garlic, soy sauce, and olive oil in a bowl to create the marinade.
instructions.tip: Warm the honey slightly to make it easier to mix.

instructions.instruction: Marinate wings for at least 2 hours or overnight for deeper flavor.
instructions.tip: Use a resealable bag to evenly coat the wings.

instructions.instruction: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat and lightly oil the grates to prevent sticking.
equipment_notes: Gas or charcoal grills both work well.
Use a grill brush to clean the grates before oiling.

instructions.instruction: Grill wings for 10–12 minutes on each side, basting with leftover marinade halfway through.
instructions.tip: Watch for flare-ups caused by dripping marinade and move wings to a cooler part of the grill if needed.

instructions.instruction: Serve hot with additional sauce on the side.
instructions.plating_instruction: Arrange wings on a wooden serving board with lime wedges and a drizzle of honey glaze.

sides.title: Grilled Corn Salad
sides.description: A light and tangy salad with charred corn, lime, and cilantro.
instructions: Grill corn until charred, then cut kernels off the cob.
Mix corn with lime juice, cilantro, red onion, and feta cheese.
Serve chilled or at room temperature.

drinks.title: Lemon Basil Mojito
drinks.description: A citrusy cocktail that complements the garlic and honey flavors.
instructions: Muddle basil leaves with lemon juice and sugar syrup.
Add rum and ice, then shake and strain into a glass.

recipes.title: Smoked BBQ Wings
recipes.description: Tender wings slow-smoked to perfection with a smoky BBQ rub and sauce.

modifications.description: Add 1 tsp cumin and 1 tbsp chili powder to the rub for a bold Texas flavor.
Replace BBQ sauce with a vinegar-based mop sauce for tangy wings.

recipes.inspiration: A celebration of classic barbecue techniques, this recipe delivers bold smoky flavors perfect for weekend gatherings.

ingredients.name: chicken wings
ingredients.notes: whole or split into flats and drumettes

instructions.instruction: Rub wings with BBQ rub, brown sugar, and paprika, ensuring even coverage.
instructions.tip: Pat wings dry before applying the rub to help the spices adhere better.

instructions.instruction: Soak wood chips in water for 30 minutes to prevent them from burning too quickly.
instructions.tip: Use applewood chips for a subtle sweet flavor or hickory for a bolder smoke.

instructions.instruction: Preheat smoker to 225°F and place the soaked wood chips in the smoking chamber.
equipment_notes: If using a grill, set up indirect heat with a smoking box for the wood chips.

instructions.instruction: Arrange wings on the smoker grates and smoke for 2 hours, flipping halfway through for even cooking.
instructions.tip: Monitor the smoker's temperature and maintain it between 225°F and 250°F.

instructions.instruction: Brush wings with BBQ sauce during the last 15 minutes of smoking to create a sticky glaze.
instructions.tip: Avoid adding sauce too early to prevent burning.

instructions.instruction: Serve hot with extra BBQ sauce on the side.
instructions.plating_instruction: Arrange wings on a rustic wooden platter with small ramekins of extra sauce.

substitutions.smoked wood chips: pecan or cherry wood chips for a different flavor profile

sides.title: Creamy Coleslaw
sides.description: A tangy and refreshing side that balances the smoky wings.
instructions: Combine cabbage and carrots in a large bowl.
Whisk together mayonnaise, vinegar, and sugar in a small bowl.
Pour dressing over the vegetables and toss to coat.
Refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving.

drinks.title: Smoky Old Fashioned
drinks.description: A bold cocktail with a hint of smoke to complement the BBQ flavor.
instructions: Muddle the sugar cube with bitters in a glass.
Add bourbon and a large ice cube.
Infuse with smoke using a smoking cloche for added flavor.

recipes.title: Hot Truffle Honey Wings
recipes.description: Crispy fried chicken wings tossed in a spicy and luxurious truffle hot honey glaze for a bold, flavorful finish.

modifications.description: Add 1 tsp ginger paste and 1 tbsp soy sauce to the truffle honey glaze.
Use rosemary-infused truffle oil for a fragrant twist.

recipes.inspiration: A luxurious twist on classic fried wings, combining bold spice and the earthy decadence of truffle honey.

instructions.instruction: Marinate chicken wings in buttermilk with cayenne and paprika for 4 hours or overnight.
instructions.tip: Longer marination enhances flavor and tenderness.

instructions.instruction: Mix flour, salt, and paprika in a bowl for the coating.
instructions.tip: Sift flour to remove clumps for a more even coating.

instructions.instruction: Coat wings in the flour mixture and let rest for 10 minutes before frying.
instructions.tip: Resting the wings ensures better adhesion of the coating.

instructions.instruction: Heat oil to 350°F in a deep fryer or heavy pot.
equipment_notes: Use a thermometer to maintain consistent frying temperature.

instructions.instruction: Fry wings in batches for 8–10 minutes until golden brown and crispy.
instructions.tip: Avoid overcrowding the fryer to maintain oil temperature.

instructions.instruction: Toss fried wings in warm truffle hot honey and garnish with red pepper flakes if desired.
instructions.plating_instruction: Serve on a slate platter with microgreens for garnish.

sides.title: Truffle Parmesan Fries
sides.description: Crispy fries tossed in Parmesan and truffle oil for a decadent side.
instructions: Fry potatoes in hot oil until golden and crispy.
Toss fries with truffle oil, Parmesan, and salt while hot.

drinks.title: Spicy Margarita
drinks.description: A zesty cocktail with a kick to complement the spicy wings.
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a salt-rimmed glass.

sides.title: Buttermilk Biscuits
sides.description: Flaky, buttery biscuits perfect as a side for fried chicken or BBQ dishes.
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F.
Mix flour, baking powder, and salt in a bowl.
Cut in cold butter until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
Add buttermilk and mix until dough forms.
Roll out dough, cut into circles, and bake for 12–15 minutes until golden brown.

sides.title: Creamy Coleslaw
sides.description: A tangy, creamy coleslaw that pairs perfectly with smoky or fried dishes.
instructions: In a large bowl, combine cabbage and carrots.
In a small bowl, whisk together mayonnaise, vinegar, and sugar.
Pour dressing over the vegetables and toss to coat.
Refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving.

sides.title: Truffle Parmesan Fries
sides.description: Crispy fries tossed in Parmesan and truffle oil for a decadent side.
instructions: Fry potatoes in hot oil until golden and crispy.
Toss fries with truffle oil, Parmesan, and salt while hot.

sides.title: Kimchi Fried Rice
sides.description: A spicy and savory fried rice made with kimchi, sesame oil, and scallions.
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a wok or skillet over medium-high heat.
Add chopped kimchi and stir-fry for 2–3 minutes.
Add rice and soy sauce, mixing well to combine.
Garnish with scallions before serving.

sides.title: Sweet Potato Fries
sides.description: Crispy and golden fries with a hint of sweetness, perfect for dipping.
instructions: Toss sweet potato strips with cornstarch to coat evenly.
Heat oil in a deep fryer or heavy pot to 350°F.
Fry sweet potatoes in batches until golden and crispy.
Drain on a wire rack and season with salt or cinnamon-sugar.

sides.title: Coconut Shrimp
sides.description: Crispy shrimp coated in coconut flakes, served with a tangy dipping sauce.
instructions: Set up a breading station with flour, eggs, and a coconut-panko mix.
Coat shrimp in flour, then dip in eggs, and coat with the coconut-panko mixture.
Fry shrimp in hot oil until golden brown and crispy.

sides.title: Garlic Knots
sides.description: Soft, buttery garlic knots made from scratch or pizza dough.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F.
Roll out dough and cut into strips, then tie into knots.
Brush knots with melted butter and garlic, then bake for 10–12 minutes.
Sprinkle with parsley before serving.

sides.title: Roasted Brussels Sprouts with Balsamic Glaze
sides.description: Charred Brussels sprouts drizzled with sweet and tangy balsamic glaze.
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F.
Toss Brussels sprouts with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Roast for 20–25 minutes until charred and tender.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze before serving.

sides.title: Cucumber Mint Salad
sides.description: A light, refreshing salad with sliced cucumbers, mint, and a citrusy dressing.
instructions: Combine sliced cucumbers and chopped mint in a bowl.
Whisk together lemon juice, olive oil, and salt for the dressing.
Pour dressing over the salad and toss gently.

sides.title: Loaded Potato Skins
sides.description: Crispy potato skins topped with cheddar, bacon, and sour cream.
instructions: Bake potatoes at 400°F for 50 minutes, then cool slightly.
Cut potatoes in half and scoop out most of the flesh, leaving a thin layer.
Brush skins with olive oil, bake until crispy, and top with cheddar and bacon.
Bake until cheese melts and garnish with sour cream and green onions.

sides.title: Cornbread Muffins
sides.description: Sweet and moist cornbread muffins, perfect for dipping in sauces.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F and grease a muffin tin.
Mix dry ingredients in one bowl and wet ingredients in another.
Combine both mixtures until smooth, then pour into muffin tins.
Bake for 15–18 minutes until golden brown.

sides.title: Mango Salsa
sides.description: A vibrant salsa with sweet mango, red onion, and a hint of lime.
instructions: Combine diced mango, red onion, cilantro, and jalapeño in a bowl.
Drizzle with lime juice and toss gently to mix.

sides.title: Dirty Rice
sides.description: A savory rice dish loaded with Cajun spices, ground meat, and vegetables.
instructions: Cook rice according to package instructions and set aside.
Sauté sausage, bell pepper, and celery in a skillet until browned.
Add Cajun seasoning and cooked rice, stirring to combine.

sides.title: Roasted Sweet Potatoes
sides.description: Tender, caramelized sweet potatoes roasted to perfection.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F.
Toss diced sweet potatoes with olive oil, cinnamon, and salt.
Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 25–30 minutes until tender.

sides.title: Scallion Pancakes
sides.description: Crispy, flaky pancakes loaded with scallions, perfect for dipping.
instructions: Mix flour with boiling water until dough forms. Knead for 5 minutes and rest for 30 minutes.
Roll dough into thin circles, brush with sesame oil, and sprinkle scallions. Roll up into a log, then flatten into a pancake.
Fry in vegetable oil over medium heat until golden and crispy on both sides.

sides.title: Parmesan Polenta
sides.description: Creamy polenta infused with Parmesan, ideal for pairing with bold flavors.
instructions: Bring water to a boil, then slowly whisk in polenta.
Reduce heat and simmer, stirring often, for 30 minutes until thickened.
Stir in butter, Parmesan, and salt. Serve warm.

sides.title: Steamed Broccolini with Garlic
sides.description: Tender broccolini lightly steamed and tossed with garlic-infused olive oil.
instructions: Steam broccolini in a steamer basket for 5–7 minutes until tender.
Heat olive oil in a skillet and sauté garlic until fragrant.
Toss steamed broccolini with garlic oil, lemon juice, and salt before serving.

sides.title: Egg Rolls
sides.description: Crispy egg rolls stuffed with a savory vegetable mix, perfect for dipping.
instructions: Mix shredded cabbage, carrots, and soy sauce in a bowl.
Place filling on each egg roll wrapper, fold tightly, and seal edges with water.
Fry in hot oil until golden brown and crispy. Serve with sweet chili sauce.

sides.title: Garlic Mashed Potatoes
sides.description: Creamy mashed potatoes with roasted garlic for added depth of flavor.
instructions: Boil potatoes in salted water until tender, then drain.
Mash potatoes with roasted garlic, butter, and milk until creamy.
Season with salt and serve warm.

sides.title: Herbed Rice Pilaf
sides.description: Fluffy rice cooked with aromatic herbs and spices, a versatile side.
instructions: Sauté diced onion in butter until translucent.
Add rice and toast for 2–3 minutes, then pour in broth.
Simmer covered until rice is cooked and fluffy, about 20 minutes.
Stir in parsley before serving.

drinks.title: Bourbon Honey Smash
drinks.description: A smoky-sweet cocktail with fresh mint and honey syrup, perfect for fried or smoky dishes.
instructions: Muddle mint with honey syrup and lemon juice in a shaker.
Add bourbon and ice, then shake well.
Strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice and garnish with a mint sprig.

drinks.title: Spicy Margarita
drinks.description: A zesty margarita with a kick, featuring jalapeño and fresh lime.
instructions: Muddle jalapeño slices with lime juice in a shaker.
Add tequila, triple sec, simple syrup, and ice, then shake well.
Strain into a salt-rimmed glass and garnish with a lime wedge.

drinks.title: Lemon Basil Mojito
drinks.description: A refreshing twist on the classic mojito, with basil and lemon juice.
instructions: Muddle basil leaves with sugar syrup and lemon juice in a shaker.
Add rum and ice, then shake and strain into a highball glass over ice.
Top with club soda and garnish with a basil sprig.

drinks.title: Classic Sweet Tea
drinks.description: A Southern staple—sweet and refreshing black tea.
instructions: Steep tea bags in boiling water for 5 minutes.
Remove tea bags and stir in sugar while the tea is hot.
Let cool, then serve over ice with optional lemon slices.

drinks.title: Dark Rum Punch
drinks.description: A tropical cocktail with dark rum, pineapple juice, and lime.
instructions: Combine rum, pineapple juice, lime juice, and grenadine in a shaker with ice.
Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a cherry and a pineapple wedge.

drinks.title: Thai Iced Tea
drinks.description: A creamy, sweet iced tea made with Thai spices and condensed milk.
instructions: Steep Thai tea mix in boiling water for 5 minutes.
Strain and stir in condensed milk and sugar while hot.
Serve over ice.

drinks.title: Soju Mule
drinks.description: A refreshing cocktail made with soju, lime, and ginger beer.
instructions: Fill a copper mug with ice.
Add soju and lime juice, then top with ginger beer.
Stir gently and garnish with a lime wedge.

drinks.title: Sparkling Lemonade
drinks.description: A refreshing non-alcoholic drink with a hint of fizz, perfect for balancing spicy wings.
instructions: Mix lemon juice and sugar in a pitcher until sugar dissolves.
Add sparkling water and stir gently.
Serve over ice and garnish with mint leaves, if desired.

drinks.title: Old Fashioned
drinks.description: A classic bourbon cocktail with a smoky twist to complement BBQ flavors.
instructions: Place the sugar cube in a rocks glass and saturate with bitters.
Add a splash of water and muddle until the sugar dissolves.
Add bourbon and ice, then stir gently.
If using, smoke the glass with wood chips before pouring. Garnish with orange peel.

drinks.title: Hibiscus Iced Tea
drinks.description: A vibrant, tangy iced tea made from hibiscus petals, naturally caffeine-free.
instructions: Steep hibiscus petals in boiling water for 5 minutes.
Strain and let cool. Sweeten with honey if desired.
Serve over ice with lime slices.

drinks.title: Mint Julep
drinks.description: A Southern classic made with bourbon, fresh mint, and sugar.
instructions: Muddle mint leaves and sugar in a julep cup or rocks glass.
Fill the glass with crushed ice, then add bourbon.
Stir gently and garnish with a mint sprig.

drinks.title: Pineapple Mojito Mocktail
drinks.description: A non-alcoholic mojito with sweet pineapple and fresh mint.
instructions: Muddle mint leaves with lime juice in a glass.
Add pineapple juice and ice, then stir well.
Top with club soda and garnish with a mint sprig.

drinks.title: Ranch Bloody Mary
drinks.description: A bold Bloody Mary with a ranch twist to pair with rich, spicy wings.
instructions: Mix vodka, tomato juice, ranch seasoning, and hot sauce in a shaker.
Pour into a glass over ice and garnish with a celery stalk.

drinks.title: Mai Tai
drinks.description: A classic tropical cocktail with rum and almond syrup.
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a glass over fresh ice.
Garnish with a lime wheel and mint sprig.

drinks.title: Elderflower Spritz
drinks.description: A light and floral sparkling drink with elderflower liqueur and prosecco.
instructions: Pour elderflower liqueur into a glass over ice.
Top with prosecco and soda water, then gently stir.
Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

drinks.title: Ginger Peach Fizz
drinks.description: A sparkling, fruity drink with the warmth of ginger and sweetness of ripe peaches.
instructions: Combine peach nectar and lime juice in a glass filled with ice.
Top with ginger ale and stir gently.
Garnish with a slice of fresh peach.

drinks.title: Cucumber Cooler
drinks.description: A light, hydrating mocktail with cucumber, mint, and lime.
instructions: Muddle cucumber slices and mint leaves with lime juice in a glass.
Add ice and simple syrup, if using, then top with club soda.
Garnish with a cucumber slice and mint sprig.

drinks.title: Tamarind Rum Punch
drinks.description: A bold Caribbean-inspired cocktail with tamarind, lime, and dark rum.
instructions: Dissolve tamarind paste and brown sugar in water.
Add rum and lime juice, then stir well.
Serve over ice and garnish with a lime wedge.

drinks.title: Apple Cinnamon Spritzer
drinks.description: A cozy fall-inspired mocktail with crisp apple and warm cinnamon flavors.
instructions: Combine apple cider and sparkling water in a glass filled with ice.
Stir gently and garnish with a cinnamon stick and apple slices.

drinks.title: Berry Sangria
drinks.description: A fruity sangria loaded with fresh berries and red wine.
instructions: Combine red wine, orange juice, and mixed berries in a pitcher.
Refrigerate for at least 1 hour to allow flavors to meld.
Serve over ice and top with club soda if desired.

sauces.title: Truffle Hot Honey Sauce
sauces.description: A luxurious sweet and spicy glaze with the earthy aroma of truffles.
instructions: Warm honey in a small saucepan over low heat.
Stir in hot sauce, truffle oil, and cayenne pepper until well combined.
Remove from heat and let cool slightly before using.

sauces.title: Bourbon BBQ Sauce
sauces.description: A smoky and sweet BBQ sauce with a bold bourbon kick.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a saucepan over medium heat.
Simmer for 10–15 minutes, stirring occasionally, until thickened.
Cool slightly and use as a glaze or dipping sauce.

sauces.title: Garlic Parmesan Butter Sauce
sauces.description: A rich, creamy sauce with bold garlic and Parmesan flavors.
instructions: Melt butter in a saucepan over low heat.
Stir in Parmesan cheese, garlic powder, and Italian seasoning until smooth.
Use as a drizzle or dip for wings.

sauces.title: Maple Sriracha Sauce
sauces.description: Sweet maple syrup meets fiery sriracha for a balanced glaze.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a small saucepan over low heat.
Stir until smooth and heated through.
Toss with wings for a sticky finish.

sauces.title: Korean Gochujang Sauce
sauces.description: A spicy and savory glaze made with Korean chili paste.
instructions: Whisk all ingredients together in a bowl until smooth.
Use as a glaze for grilled or baked wings.

sauces.title: Sweet Chili Lime Sauce
sauces.description: A tangy and slightly spicy glaze with lime and chili.
instructions: Combine sweet chili sauce, lime juice, lime zest, and red pepper flakes in a small bowl.
Stir until smooth and well combined.
Use as a glaze or dipping sauce.

sauces.title: Chipotle Lime Crema
sauces.description: A smoky, creamy dip with a zesty lime kick.
instructions: Blend sour cream, minced chipotle, lime juice, and garlic powder until smooth.
Refrigerate for 30 minutes before serving.

sauces.title: Tandoori Yogurt Sauce
sauces.description: A creamy, spiced yogurt sauce for Indian-inspired wings.
instructions: Whisk together yogurt, tandoori spice mix, lime juice, and garlic paste.
Serve as a dipping sauce for grilled or baked wings.

sauces.title: Honey Mustard Sauce
sauces.description: A classic combination of sweet honey and tangy mustard.
instructions: Whisk together Dijon mustard, honey, and mayonnaise until smooth.
Use as a dipping sauce or glaze for wings.

sauces.title: Moroccan Harissa Sauce
sauces.description: A spicy, aromatic sauce with North African flavors.
instructions: Mix harissa paste, olive oil, lemon juice, and minced garlic in a bowl.
Serve as a dipping sauce or glaze for wings.

sauces.title: Coconut Curry Sauce
sauces.description: A creamy, aromatic curry sauce with coconut milk.
instructions: Simmer coconut milk, curry powder, lime juice, and brown sugar over medium heat until slightly thickened.
Use as a glaze or dipping sauce.

sauces.title: Buffalo Ranch Sauce
sauces.description: A creamy ranch dressing with a tangy Buffalo kick.
instructions: Whisk ranch dressing, Buffalo sauce, and garlic powder until smooth.
Serve as a dipping sauce or toss with wings.

sauces.title: Maple Bacon Glaze
sauces.description: A rich and sweet glaze with smoky bacon undertones.
instructions: Combine maple syrup, bacon fat, brown sugar, and apple cider vinegar in a saucepan.
Simmer over medium heat until thickened.
Brush onto wings while grilling or serve as a dipping sauce.

sauces.title: Szechuan Peppercorn Sauce
sauces.description: A spicy, numbing sauce with bold Szechuan flavors.
instructions: Heat chili oil in a saucepan and sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add soy sauce, hoisin sauce, and crushed Szechuan peppercorns.
Simmer for 5 minutes and use as a glaze or dipping sauce.

sauces.title: Lemon Herb Butter Sauce
sauces.description: A light and buttery sauce with fresh lemon and herbs.
instructions: Melt butter in a saucepan over low heat.
Stir in lemon juice, parsley, and garlic until well combined.
Drizzle over wings or serve as a dipping sauce.

sauces.title: Mango Habanero Sauce
sauces.description: A fruity and fiery sauce with mango and habanero peppers.
instructions: Blend mango puree, minced habanero, honey, and lime juice until smooth.
Simmer mixture over medium heat for 5 minutes.
Cool slightly and use as a glaze or dip.

sauces.title: Black Garlic Soy Glaze
sauces.description: A deep, umami-packed glaze with black garlic and soy sauce.
instructions: Mash black garlic into a paste.
Combine with soy sauce, brown sugar, and rice vinegar in a saucepan.
Simmer until thickened and brush onto wings.

sauces.title: Peanut Hoisin Sauce
sauces.description: A creamy and nutty sauce with a hint of sweetness.
instructions: Whisk together peanut butter, hoisin sauce, soy sauce, and lime juice until smooth.
Thin with water if needed and serve as a dipping sauce.

sauces.title: Honey Balsamic Reduction
sauces.description: A tangy and sweet sauce with a rich, syrupy texture.
instructions: Combine balsamic vinegar and honey in a saucepan over medium heat.
Simmer until reduced by half and thickened.
Drizzle over wings or serve as a dipping sauce.

sauces.title: Savory Herb Ranch Sauce
sauces.description: A creamy and herby sauce with a savory twist.
instructions: Whisk mayonnaise, buttermilk, dill, and garlic powder until smooth.
Chill for 20 minutes before serving.

seasoning_blends.title: Southern Spice Blend
seasoning_blends.description: A versatile seasoning mix for fried or grilled dishes.
instructions: Combine all ingredients and store in an airtight container.

seasoning_blends.title: Cajun Spice Blend
seasoning_blends.description: A bold, spicy mix for blackened or fried dishes.
instructions: Mix all ingredients thoroughly and store in a cool, dry place.

seasoning_blends.title: BBQ Dry Rub
seasoning_blends.description: A smoky, sweet rub for grilled and smoked wings.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a bowl.
Rub generously on wings before grilling or smoking.

seasoning_blends.title: Lemon Pepper Seasoning
seasoning_blends.description: A tangy and zesty blend for a refreshing twist.
instructions: Mix all ingredients and use as a dry rub.
Toss wings in seasoning after frying or baking.

seasoning_blends.title: Chipotle Lime Rub
seasoning_blends.description: A smoky, spicy, and tangy rub with chipotle and lime.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a small bowl.
Rub onto wings before grilling or roasting.

seasoning_blends.title: Maple Bourbon Rub
seasoning_blends.description: A sweet and warming blend with maple and bourbon notes.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a bowl and mix well.
Rub onto wings before roasting or smoking.

seasoning_blends.title: Tandoori Spice Mix
seasoning_blends.description: A bold Indian-inspired blend for grilled or baked wings.
instructions: Mix all ingredients thoroughly and store in an airtight container.
Use as a rub or mix with yogurt for a marinade.

seasoning_blends.title: Moroccan Spice Blend
seasoning_blends.description: A fragrant blend with sweet and earthy spices.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a bowl and store in an airtight container.
Rub onto wings before grilling or baking.

seasoning_blends.title: Sweet Chili Lime Rub
seasoning_blends.description: A sweet and tangy seasoning with a mild chili kick.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a bowl.
Rub onto wings before grilling or roasting.

seasoning_blends.title: Garlic Herb Blend
seasoning_blends.description: A light and fresh mix of garlic and Mediterranean herbs.
instructions: Mix all ingredients together.
Toss wings in the blend after cooking or use as a pre-cooking rub.

seasoning_blends.title: Mango Habanero Rub
seasoning_blends.description: A fruity and spicy seasoning blend for bold flavors.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a bowl.
Rub onto wings before grilling or frying.

seasoning_blends.title: Blackened Cajun Rub
